Title: Expands off-track betting to include the five counties comprising the city of New York; repealer
Summary: Expands off-track betting to include the five counties comprising the city of New York which shall now be considered part of the Catskill region.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
LawCode: Amd §519, add §§517-a & 517-b, rpld §532 sub 7, RWB L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to expanding off-track betting to include the five counties comprising the city of New York; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
